page.title: 11Sport & Leisure..Newborough
page.content:
The traditional country pursuits of {hunting, shooting}and{fishing}are still popular - as are{walking, horse {riding}and{cycling.
Also enjoyed are{football, cricket, {motor cycle scrambling, keep fit, {jogging, weight training, golf}and {tennis}- although all facilities are not in the village. Indoor sports include{dominoes}and{darts.
The playing field was purchased for the village by the{Parish Council;}a {Playing Field Group}raises funds for its upkeep with fortnightly Bingo evenings etc.
Facilities include -: {Football pitch Swings See-Saw {Hanging bars Seats
